alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 27 at 2:45PM MDT until June 27 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN MEADE AND SOUTHEASTERN LAWRENCE COUNTIES... At 244 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Nemo, or 13 miles northwest of Rapid City, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Hail up to golf ball size. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. This severe storm will be near... Summerset and Piedmont around 255 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Black Hawk, Ellsworth Air Force Base and northern Box Elder. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 40 and 53. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
